title: Set Up Your Blog With WordPress Your Ultimate Guide

Not sure where to get started, though? You should read Ã¢â‚¬Å“Set Up Your Blog With WordPress: Your Ultimate GuideÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ by author James Bruce. This manual outlines everything you need to know in order to set up a blog and turn it into a real success.
